2079480.name: The Third Shift
2079480.description:
A museum in need of security...

A person in need of money...

An odd occurrence.

The Third Shift is a Game Boy styled horror game that combines first, second, and third person perspectives. Watch your stamina and sustain your mental health as you patrol the halls and complete your third shift.

A Museum to Secure

You're the newly-hired night shift security guard at the Roanoke Museum of History and Wonder when things don't go as planned. Patrol through a variety of exhibits including the Human Body exhibit, the Terrors of the Deep, the Mystery of Roanoke exhibit and more.

Unravel the Mystery

Strange happenings are afoot on Roanoke island. As you learn more about the freak occurrences happening all around you, you'll uncover mysteries surrounding the museum and the nearby community.

Embrace the History

The Third Shift was created as an homage to the Game Boy aesthetic. Wander through the halls, experience the puzzling exhibits, and run for your life in an 8-bit inspired style.

 Controls

  •  Move: Arrow Keys or WASD

  •  Interact (A Button): Space or Z 

  •  Sprint (B Button): B or X

  •  Exit: Esc

  •  Menu: M

  •  Inventory: I

Note: Limited Gamepad Support is available.
